1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- When you use ghci, please :set -idist/build/autogen
4
5-- | Version number.
6module Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Library.Version
7  ( version,
8    versionString,
9  ) where
10
11import qualified Data.Version                     as V
12import qualified Paths_koshucode_baala_calculator as V
13
14-- | Version number of the Koshucode calculator.
15version :: V.Version
16version = V.version
17
18-- | String representation of the version number.
19versionString :: String
20versionString = V.showVersion V.version
21
